title: Important Update: Income Tax Department's Download Intimation Services Temporarily Unavailable
content:
# Important Update: Income Tax Department's Download Intimation Services Temporarily Unavailable

Ek important update hai! Income Tax Department ne announce kiya hai ki download intimation services temporarily unavailable rahengi due to scheduled maintenance. Taxpayers ko thodi inconvenience ho sakti hai, but yeh services jald hi resume ho jayengi.

**Key Details:**
*   **Service Impacted:** Download Intimation Services.
*   **Unavailability Period:** From 9:00 PM on February 6, 2026.
*   **Expected Resumption:** By 8:00 AM on February 9, 2026.
*   **Reason:** Scheduled maintenance activity.

We understand that this might cause some disruption, aur Income Tax Department regrets any inconvenience caused. Services restore hone ke baad aap apni intimations download kar payenge.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Visit the Income Tax Department's Official Website for updates](https://www.incometax.gov.in/iec/foportal/)

*Published on: 8 February 2026*
